Croppie

Croppie is a fast, easy to use image cropping plugin with tons of configuration options!

Options


        $("#item").imageCropper({
          viewportWidth: Integer,
          viewportHeight: Integer,
          boundaryWidth: Integer,
          boundaryHeight: Integer,
          customClass: String,
          showZoom: Boolean,
          update: Function (cropper) { }
        });
